divs: Sighting DetailsAbout a month ago while sitting on my front porch I noticed a flash in my peripheral view. Since that night every clear night I have witnessed the same flash at apprx. 3 min. intervals for a duration of apprx. 30 mins. Have been trying to come up with a reasonable explanation ever since . I do know that it makes my hair stand on end every time I watch it.
Summary: Light pulse apprx. in 3 min intervals..every night around 10:15pm lasting 30mins.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around September 10th 2012
